title: Can a woman read or touch Quran while on menses/period? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Vicky Nordine says can a woman read Quran when menstruating either using the Quran or any electronic device the vast majority of scholars prohibit a woman in her menses to touch the Quran but reciting the Quran reading the Quran is totally permissible for a woman and her menses if you want to hold the Quran the book itself wear gloves or touch it with a piece of cloth but it's always best to read it from a mobile device or a PDA or a computer or even a book of tafseer you don't have to have any thing on your hands to do that
